name: Tomas' Escape
description:
Game description

Tomas' Escape is a horror building escape game. The point of the game is to find your way down the building. The obstacles are locked doors, enemies, fog, dark and traps. Enemy attacks can be evaded by clicking the right button at the right time when it comes nearby. Once enemy hits you or you escape, it is deactivated for a short time in the same position. You can also make the enemy flee to it‘s throne and come back by hitting it with an axe. The enemy cannot be killed. The player can die from enemy attacks, traps, falling. The player can pick up items like energy drink, health potion, axe and torchlight.

Descriptions of the controls / keys

The player movement is controlled using default W, A, S, D keys and using SPACE key to jump. Pause can be called using Escape key. Quick time events are finished with either F or X keys. Axe hit is called when the player left clicks with his mouse while having an axe equiped. Interactions with objects are done using the E key and inventory items are taken using number keys 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.
